messages.content: ComfyUI-RequestsPoster is a custom node that simply posts HttpRequest from ComfyUI.

You can install ComfyUI-RequestsPoster by either copying the clone URL from this repository using 'Install via Git URL' in ComfyUI-Manager, or by opening the Custom_nodes folder in ComfyUI via Command Prompt and running 'git clone https://github.com/aburahamu/ComfyUI-RequestsPoster.git'.
After installation, what should I do?
After installation, you should restart ComfyUI.

To use ComfyUI-RequestsPoster, add the PostRequest node via AddNode > RequestsPoster > PostRequest. Connect any node you want to trigger to 'any', paste the URL you want to send a request to in the 'URL' field, add key-value pairs in the 'key' and 'value' fields, and enqueue.
Can I use ComfyUI-RequestsPoster with Discord webhooks?
Yes, ComfyUI-RequestsPoster can make use of Discord webhooks to post messages to a Discord server.
How can I get the WebhookURL for Discord?
To get the WebhookURL for Discord, add a server on Discord, click on the gear icon for the server you just added, go to Webhooks and click 'URL to copy'.
What happens when I generate an image with ComfyUI-RequestsPoster?
When you generate an image with ComfyUI-RequestsPoster, a message gets posted on Discord.
